description: The staff of a renowned sorceress, lost for countless millennia.
trivia: The item's internal name was Trident until November 30, 2017 Patch.
tips: The mana loss reduction does not only work for mana cost of spells, it affects any form of mana loss not caused by losing intelligence.
attrs: Bonus +16 Intelligence +8% Spell damage +12% Mana loss reduction
info: For strength heroes, it grants 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 9.12% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 9.12% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 240 mana, 1 mana regen, 9.4% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
Mana loss reduction and spell damage amplification from multiple Kaya-based items (Kaya, Kaya and Sange, Yasha and Kaya) do not stack.
Stacks additively with other sources of mana loss reduction.
